summary: Tested auto-save functionality implementation for Estimates, Contacts, and Employees modules. Estimates module auto-save verified working with 'Saved Just now' indicator and console log confirmation. Contacts and Employees modules couldn't be fully tested due to server rate limiting (429 errors).

minor.issue: Rate limiting (429) triggered when navigating between modules rapidly

estimates_autosave_indicator.description: Auto-save indicator shows 'Saved Just now' with green dot after entering data in Create New Estimate form

estimates_autosave_console_log.description: Console log confirms: [AutoSave] estimate_new saved at 2026-02-22T14:20:57.220Z

estimates_autosave_debounce.description: Auto-save triggers after 2000ms debounce as configured

estimates_form_fields_saved.description: Reference # and Subject fields were filled and auto-saved correctly

contacts_autosave.description: Unable to test due to server rate limiting (429 errors)

employees_autosave.description: Unable to test due to server rate limiting (429 errors)

close_dialog_save_discard.description: Unsaved changes dialog couldn't be triggered in test session

draft_recovery_banner.description: Draft recovery banner couldn't be tested due to rate limiting

useAutoSave_hook.details: Properly implements localStorage persistence with debounce, user/org context, and save/restore functionality

useUnsavedChanges_hook.details: Tracks dirty state with deep comparison, supports browser beforeunload and React Router navigation blocking

useFormPersistence_hook.details: Combined hook properly integrates auto-save and unsaved changes tracking

AutoSaveIndicator_component.details: Shows 'Saving...', 'Unsaved changes', or 'Saved X ago' with colored dot indicators

DraftRecoveryBanner_component.details: Shows banner when saved draft exists with Restore/Discard options

estimates_integration.details: newEstimatePersistence and editEstimatePersistence hooks properly configured

contacts_integration.details: contactPersistence hook properly configured with dialog state tracking

employees_integration.details: employeePersistence hook properly configured with dialog state tracking

critical_code_review_comments: React key duplicate warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - may need to review key generation for list items
Chart sizing warning in console - charts have negative dimensions which should be fixed

success_rate.frontend: 100% for Estimates module (4/4 tests passed), Contacts and Employees modules untested due to rate limiting

seed_data_creation: None required - tested auto-save with form field input
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auto-save feature verified working in Estimates module - shows 'Saved Just now' indicator after 2 second debounce. Contacts and Employees modules have the same implementation but couldn't be fully tested due to server rate limiting. Code review confirms all hooks and components are correctly implemented. The localStorage key format is 'autosave_[org_id]_[user_id]_[form_key]'. To test: 1) Navigate to Estimates > Create New tab, 2) Enter data in Reference # or Subject field, 3) Wait 2+ seconds, 4) Observe 'Saved Just now' indicator with green dot.
